about me

couple things to know

bio

My name is Nikolay Zhukov, a cinematographer, founder of Marshal video production and a few other projects that help evolve computer graphics in Belarus. I was able to realize numerous project in various countries for different brands and artists as well. Passionate about cinematography, videoproducing, photography, traveling, astronomy, and philosophy. Can speak english, russian, italian, turkish, and belorussian languages. For more information please feel free to contact me.
